alert.note: Alert for Jones; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 11:55PM MDT until July 04 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jones County in central South Dakota... Western Stanley County in central South Dakota... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 1255 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cherry Creek to 11 miles southwest of Okaton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Intersection of Highway 83 and White River, Sansarc and Westover. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
